thread.title: Pornhub's Traffic Takes a Valentine's Day Nosedive
thread.title_full: Pornhub's Traffic Takes a Valentine's Day Nosedive

author: samjgrasso@gmail.com (Samantha Grasso)
title: Pornhub's Traffic Takes a Valentine's Day Nosedive
text:
Pornhub Nevada, Massachusetts, and Rhode Island are among the states with the largest drops in traffic on V Day, while Minnesota, Vermont, and Louisiana see drops of just 2 percent. Searches for porn relating to, "Valentine," as well as "love," "passionate," and "romance," see significant jumps on the big day, with the first term seeing an increase of 1,093 percent. Pornhub 
That's not to say that single folks with nowhere to go on a Tuesday night are out of luckâ€”for today only Pornhub is giving away free Pornhub Premium , providing access to ad-free, high-definition videos, faster streaming, and full DVDs for a service that's typically $9.99 a month. 
"Get stoked to spend this V-day with your new bae, Pornhub Premium. No credit card, no strings, just free Premium on Valentines," the promotional webpage reads. 
Maybe the 24-hour promo will be just the trick to keep Pornhub's views on the rise during such a romantic day.
